content:
Can the IG Publisher generate DSTU2 output too? or only STU3?
I'm trying it with 1.0.2 in the version, and it has some issue trying to output

Definitions 1.0.2-7202                                                           (40.0057sec)
Connect to Terminology Server at http://tx.fhir.org/r3                           (40.0072sec)
Initialization complete                                                          (47.0083sec)
Load Content                                                                     (47.0155sec)
Publishing Content Failed: Unknown ContactPointSystem code 'url'                 (47.0201sec)
Does this suggest its trying to connect to the wrong terminology server to produce a DSTU2 IG?
Looks like my ig.xml was in the wrong format.
